docs.text: CLI Reference This page provides documentation for our command line tools. matecursa Usage: matecursa [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: Name Type Description Default --help boolean Show this message and exit. False divisions Usage: matecursa divisions [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file divisions_hortizontal.pdf --pages integer number of pages 10 --min-dividend integer min dividend 1000 --max-dividend integer max dividend 9999 --min-divisor integer min divisor 2 --max-divisor integer max divisor 9 --disable-marge-calculs boolean deixa marge per calcul True --help boolean Show this message and exit. False multiplicacions Usage: matecursa multiplicacions [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file multiplicacions.pdf --pages integer number of pages 30 --min integer min int 1 --max integer max int 6 --min-segona-unitat integer max int segona unitat 0 --max-segona-unitat integer max int segona unitat 0 --multiplicador integer multiplicador 1 --disable-total-operacions boolean Elimina missatge de total de operacions False --help boolean Show this message and exit. False multiplicacions-vertical Usage: matecursa multiplicacions-vertical [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file multiplicacions_vertical.pdf --pages integer number of pages 10 --min-factor1 integer max int 1000 --max-factor1 integer max int 9999 --min-factor2 integer max int 10 --max-factor2 integer max int 99 --disable-total-operacions boolean Elimina missatge de total de operacions True --help boolean Show this message and exit. False problemes Usage: matecursa problemes [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file problemes.pdf --pagines integer numero de pàgines 4 --sumes-min integer sumes min int 5 --sumes-max integer sumes max int 150 --mul-min integer multiplicacions min int 2 --mul-max integer multiplicacions max int 10 --help boolean Show this message and exit. False restes Usage: matecursa restes [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file restes.pdf --pages integer number of pages 10 --min integer max int 1 --max integer max int 5 --multiplicador integer multiplicador 1 --help boolean Show this message and exit. False restes-vertical Usage: matecursa restes-vertical [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file restes_vertical.pdf --pages integer number of pages 10 --min integer max int 100 --max integer max int 999 --disable-total-operacions boolean Elimina missatge de total de operacions True --help boolean Show this message and exit. False sumes Usage: matecursa sumes [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file sumes.pdf --pages integer number of pages 30 --min integer min int 1 --max integer max int 6 --min-segona-unitat integer max int segona unitat 0 --max-segona-unitat integer max int segona unitat 0 --multiplicador integer multiplicador 1 --disable-total-operacions boolean Elimina missatge de total de operacions True --help boolean Show this message and exit. False sumes-horitzontal Usage: matecursa sumes-horitzontal [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file sumes_hortizontal.pdf --pages integer number of pages 10 --min1 integer min int 100 --max1 integer max int 900 --min2 integer min int 100 --max2 integer max int 300 --min3 integer min int 10 --max3 integer max int 100 --disable-marge-calculs boolean deixa marge per calcul False --help boolean Show this message and exit. False taules-multiplicar Usage: matecursa taules-multiplicar [OPTIONS] Options: Name Type Description Default --file text output file taules_multiplicar.pdf --min integer min int 2 --max integer max int 30 --help boolean Show this message and exit. False
